bio: Com uma vis√£o √∫nica e sens√≠vel, trabalho lado a lado para criar imagens que transcendem o momento e se tornam mem√≥rias eternas. Minha abordagem combina t√©cnica refinada com uma aten√ß√£o especial aos detalhes e √†s emo√ß√µes genu√≠nas de cada casal.

text: Documentar sua hist√≥ria vibrante e inestim√°vel revela n√£o apenas os valores e mem√≥rias de sua jornada compartilhada, mas tamb√©m as ra√≠zes e heran√ßas que os unem. items.question: Qual √© o seu estilo de fotografia?

Busco uma fotografia que v√° al√©m da est√©tica bonita: quero registrar sentimentos reais, gestos espont√¢neos e a atmosfera do dia exatamente como ela aconteceu ‚Äî sem poses engessadas ou interfer√™ncias excessivas.

Trabalho de forma documental e art√≠stica, criando imagens que continuem emocionando daqui a 10, 20 ou 30 anos.
Cada casamento √© √∫nico, e minhas fotos refletem isso: narrativa, luz natural, composi√ß√£o refinada e muita sensibilidade.

items.question: Voc√™ viaja para casamentos internacionais?

about.title:
About
Us
about.typographySubtitle: EACH WEDDING IS A UNIQUE STORY. EACH MOMENT IS A WORK OF ART. EACH PHOTOGRAPH IS A MEMORY FOREVER.

intro.text: Love is a purposeful, shared exchange
intro.subtext: The Lucas Lima Studio essence is grounded on something just as profound: what we, as wedding photographers, receive from people in love, their families, their friends‚Äîtheir entire worlds.

people.name: Lucas Lima
bio: I have had the privilege of telling love stories in places like the United States, Morocco, the Czech Republic, Portugal, Italy, France, Uruguay, and Mexico. Each destination brought new perspectives, cultures, and inspirations, contributing to the refinement of my style‚Äîa signature I recognize and value today: Timeless Photography.

My work is guided by a constant search for authentic emotions. I believe in the power of images that withstand time, that do not follow fleeting trends, but remain beautiful, sensitive, and true over the years. This is what moves me: capturing what is eternal in the ephemeral.

people.name: Juliana Lima
bio: With a unique and sensitive vision, I work side by side to create images that transcend the moment and become eternal memories. My approach combines refined technique with special attention to details and the genuine emotions of each couple.
I believe that each wedding has its own narrative, and my role is to capture this story authentically and artistically, creating a visual legacy that will be valued for generations.

text: Documenting your vibrant and invaluable story reveals not only the values and memories of your shared journey but also the roots and heritage that bind you. These layers of connection shine with the richness of natural photography, capturing the depth and beauty of your emotions in a truly sublime way.

We create wedding images bathed in light to preserve the essence of this momentous day‚Äîa celebration of love, trust, and the unwavering belief in life's best days, which form the foundation of all your tomorrows.
Amid the whirlwind of grand moments, your impeccable taste deserves simplicity, over excess. Like the diamond on your finger, our imagery is carefully crafted to make your love shine brilliantly.
We simply delight in the possibility of you. That is why we've turned our love of beauty into an exquisite life, that of your wedding photographers.

contact.title:
Contact
Us
contact.infoText: To contact LUCASLIMA or request a detailed quote for our wedding photography services, please fill out your information and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Full Name
form.planner: Do you have a planner? If yes, which one?
form.consent: I agree that the information submitted above will be stored and used to communicate with me.
form.consentRequired: ‚ö†Ô∏è You must accept the consent to submit.
form.success: ‚úÖ We received your message. We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: ‚ùå Unable to send. Please try again later.

items.question: What is your photography style?
items.answer:
My style is timeless, elegant, and deeply connected to each couple's story.

I seek photography that goes beyond beautiful aesthetics: I want to record real feelings, spontaneous gestures, and the atmosphere of the day exactly as it happened‚Äîwithout stiff poses or excessive interference.

I work in a documentary and artistic way, creating images that will continue to move you 10, 20, or 30 years from now.
Each wedding is unique, and my photos reflect that: narrative, natural light, refined composition, and great sensitivity.

items.question: Do you travel for international weddings?
items.answer:
Yes, with pleasure.
I photograph weddings in Brazil and abroad, accompanying couples who choose to celebrate their story in special destinations around the world.

I already perform international weddings and destination weddings, taking care of all logistics so the experience is smooth and safe for you‚Äîfrom planning to the final delivery of images.

Just tell me where your big day will be. üåç

items.question: How does photo delivery work?
items.answer:
After the wedding, I carefully curate all images to tell the full story of the day.
You receive:
‚Ä¢ Exclusive, elegant, and easy-to-use online gallery
‚Ä¢ High-resolution photos, ready for download
‚Ä¢ Secure long-term backup for total peace of mind

The average delivery time is up to 30 days, and each gallery is designed so you can relive every moment with the same emotion as the wedding day.

items.question: Do you offer printed albums?
items.answer:
Yes‚Äîand they are an essential part of the experience.

My albums are produced with the world's best materials, fully customized, with original design and premium finish.
They transform the wedding story into a timeless physical object that spans generations.

In addition to the main album, I also offer mini-albums for parents and options for boxes, special covers, and exclusive formats.

items.question: How many photographers will be at my wedding?
items.answer:
This depends on the size, dynamics, and proposal of your event.
I normally work with 2 to 3 photographers, ensuring that all important moments are recorded with depth, sensitivity, and security.

Each team is tailored to your wedding‚Äînothing is standard, everything is personalized.

items.question: How do we reserve the date?
items.answer:
Booking is simple and secure:

1. We talk to understand the history and project of your wedding
2. We define the ideal package for you
3. We send the contract
4. The date is guaranteed upon signing the contract and paying the deposit

From then on, you can count on my complete support until the big day.

photobook.quote: "A photograph not taken is a memory that does not exist. A photograph not printed is a memory that cannot be touched."
